data.name: Elemental HERO Knospe
data.desc: Each time this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent: It gains 100 ATK and loses 100 DEF. While you control another face-up "Elemental HERO" monster, your opponent cannot target this card for an attack, and this card can attack your opponent directly.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack
